@@ -43,0 +43,6 @@

+  // JEDEC encoded as ((bank - 1) << 7) | (0x7f & JEDEC)
+  enum VendorId {
+    RIVOS = 0x6cf, // JEDEC: 0x4f, Bank: 14
+  };
+
